attributes.review: The app gets to many glitches. when it glitched it felt like my phone was being manipulated by a ghost. It stole my pet dinasour. Do not download the app. It hacked my phone. It got the contact to my cousins boyfriends sister cousins grandma moms dog. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THE APP.
